name: The Flame Spirit
description:
Short, little puzzle game created for the Mini Game Jam #103

Instructions:

  • Arrow keys to move and to aim your fire.
  • Space to shoot fire.
  • The ghosts copy all of your moves. 
  • Don't let you or a ghost get hit. 
  • Use the fire to light up torches. 
  • Light up all the torches in the room to go to the next level.

Credits:
